description: Government data integration platform connecting client systems to official entity databases via REST APIs
provider: Ministry of Commerce / National Information Center (NIC)

real_estate_deeds_api.name: Real Estates Deeds (الصكوك العقارية)
real_estate_deeds_api.description: Inquire about real estate deed data including serial number, property type, and more
real_estate_deeds_api.note: Full technical docs (endpoints, request/response schemas) are only visible after login on the developer portal. The API page renders as desktop-only interactive documentation.

authentication.description: Fixed API key obtained after creating an app in your WATHQ account. The API key is fixed (not rotating).
authentication.ip_restriction: None — general access, no IP whitelisting needed

basic.payment: Mada, Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, SADAD

onboarding_steps: 3. Choose a package (trial is free, 100 queries, 30 days)
4. Create an app in your account
5. Get the API key from the app settings
6. Integrate using the technical documentation on the API page

national_address.name: National Address (العنوان الوطني)
national_address.note: Can cross-reference with parcel national address data

technical_notes.environments: Single environment only (no staging/sandbox for deeds)
technical_notes.documentation_access: Full endpoint docs (request params, response schema) require login at developer.wathq.sa

example_repos.description: Community examples for extracting WATHQ JSON data (commercial registration and national address shown, but pattern applies to deeds)

next_steps: Register at developer.wathq.sa (free trial: 100 queries / 30 days)
Create an app and obtain API key
Access the Real Estates Deeds API documentation (requires login)
Test with a known deed serial number
Map deed fields to parcel data from Geoportal (PARCELID <-> deed number)
